original_text: You went away from me, like a daughter who refuses to obey her father. Do not continue to turn away from me. I, the Lord, promise to do a new thing. Women will take care of men!’ The people of Judah will be strong again You went away from me, like a daughter who refuses to obey her father. Do not continue to turn away from me. I, the Lord, promise to do a new thing. Women will take care of men!’ The people of Judah will be strong again You went away from me,
korean_text: 반역한 딸아 네가 어느 때까지 방황하겠느냐 여호와가 새 일을 세상에 창조하였나니 곧 여자가 남자를 둘러 싸리라

sentences.original_text: like a daughter who refuses to obey her father
Do not continue to turn away from me
I, the Lord, promise to do a new thing
sentences.korean_translation: 나 주가 새로운 일을 하겠다고 약속한다

sentences.original_text: Women will take care of men
The people of Judah will be strong again
